test_cases.golden_answer: Your vet appointment is next Friday at Dr. Peterson's clinic on Maple Street.

test_cases.query: What training classes did I sign up for?
test_cases.golden_answer: You signed up for puppy training classes at PetSmart that start on April 1st, every Saturday morning at 9am.
Your daughter Sarah is 8 years old. Her birthday was last month in February.
